-- Creating the File Format, using csv parameters.
 -- This File Format will reside into the External file formats folder.
 CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CsvFormat
     WITH (
         FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
         FORMAT_OPTIONS(
         FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
         STRING_DELIMITER = '"'
         )
     );
 GO;

 CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.orders
 (
     SalesOrderNumber VARCHAR(10),
     SalesOrderLineNumber INT,
     OrderDate DATE,
     CustomerName VARCHAR(25),
     EmailAddress VARCHAR(50),
     Item VARCHAR(30),
     Quantity INT,
     UnitPrice DECIMAL(18,2),
     TaxAmount DECIMAL (18,2)
 )
 WITH
 (
     DATA_SOURCE =sales_data,
     LOCATION = 'csv/*.csv',
     -- Creating the external table using CsvFormat as a parameter.
     FILE_FORMAT = CsvFormat
 );
 GO
